headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Jobs for New Platforms
content:
To make the most of the increased player count, a selection of brand new, 30 player Jobs have been addedâ€“ there are now 30 player Races, DMs, LTS and Captures as well as 16 player Parachute Jobs.

Additionally there are some action-packed Playlists for 30 players, if you can handle the heat.
